extendedInfo.description: ââââââââââââââââââââââCurrently on Sale! 50% Off, Don't miss it! ââââââââââââââââââââââABOUT CARNIVOROUS PLANTS=====================Carnivorous plants are plants that derive some of their nutrients from trapping and consuming animals ,insects and other arthropods. Carnivorous plants have adapted to grow in places where the soil is thin or poor in nutrients such as acidic bogs and rock outcroppings. Charles Darwin wrote Insectivorous Plants, the first well-known treatise on carnivorous plants, in 1875.Carnivorous plants have always been a popular plant to keep by hobbyist.ABOUT THIS APP==============Carnivorous Plants Encyclopedia is an application containing detailed information of over 800 species of Carnivorous Plants. It is probably the most complete and comprehensive Encyclopedia of Carnivorous Plants available in the App Market. This App is an excellent app for carnivorous plants hobbyist who are interested in understanding more about these amazing plants. âââââââââââââââââââââââWHAT YOU WILL EXPECT This application has the following features:- 2-Level Category Views with THUMBNAIL preview of each plant- All Category View to preview all plants in alphabetical order- Single Category View to list plants of the same category- Ability to BOOKMARK selected plants for easier reference- A plant name SEARCH engine- OFFLINE browsingThe application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.ââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is proudly presented by ColaKey LLC.
